intro: Argostemma tenue, commonly known as slender argostemma, is a herbaceous plant native to tropical regions of Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many flowering plants. The plant features slender, creeping stems that often root at the nodes, forming dense mats. Its small, white or pale yellow flowers are typically arranged in clusters and bloom during the summer months. The leaves are opposite, elliptical, and have a slightly hairy texture, contributing to its distinctive appearance.
